proland::TileSamplerZ::TreeZSort

proland::TileSamplerZ::TreeZSort Struct Reference

Public Member Functions

bool operator() (const TreeZ *x, const TreeZ *y) const
 Returns true if x's level is less than y's level.

Detailed Description

A sort operator to sort TreeZ elements.

It is used to read back coarsest tiles first (i.e. those whose level is minimal).
